headline: Netflix All Cash Warner Bros. Discovery Bid Puts Debt And Regulators In Focus
summary: Netflix (NasdaqGS:NFLX) has revised its proposed acquisition of Warner Bros. Discovery into an all cash offer. The amended structure increases Netflix's funding needs and potential debt load ahead of a major U.S. Senate antitrust subcommittee hearing on the deal. The upcoming hearing is expected to focus on competition concerns in streaming and content production tied to the transaction. Netflix, known for its global streaming service and growing content production business, is pursuing...
